text: William Broom (26 February 1895 – 5 January 1971) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1971 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Brigg Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: William Broom
